Detailed Description

The OSMRelationMember class is used to store information about individual members within an OSMRelation object. The OSMRelationMember class is largely useless unless it is being used in conjunction with an OSMRelation and, in turn an OSMMap as only the id of a node or way is stored within the OSMRelationMember, and the OSMRelation and OSMMap are needed to get a pointer to the OSMNode or OSMWay object.

OSMRelationMember::OSMRelationMember ( QXmlStreamReader &  xml  ) 

Read an OSMRelationMember object from the given QXmlStreamReader object. The xml stream needs to be at the start of a member element. (i.e. xml.isStartElement() && xml.name() == "member")

Parameters:
xml The QXmlStreamReader to be read from

Definition at line 13 of file osmrelationmember.cpp.

References readMember().

Member Function Documentation

OSMRelationMember OSMRelationMember::readMember ( QXmlStreamReader &  xml  ) 

Read the type and id number of the member from the specified XML stream. The xml stream needs to be at the start of a member element. (i.e. xml.isStartElement() && xml.name() == "member") A copy of the member is returned so that it can be used in other functions.

Parameters:
xml The XML stream to read from
Returns:
A copy of the OSMRelationMember after the XML data has been read.
